org.openimaj.audio

Interface AudioEventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AudioEventAdapter

    public interface AudioEventListener
    An interface for events that may occur during audio streaming.
    Version:
    $Author$, $Revision$, $Date$
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void afterPlay(AudioPlayer ap, SampleChunk sc)
      Called after the audio player given has played a sample chunk
      void audioEnded()
      Called when the audio stream reaches the end.
      void beforePlay(SampleChunk sc)
      Called before a sample chunk has been played.

    • Method Detail

      • beforePlay

        void beforePlay(SampleChunk sc)
        Called before a sample chunk has been played.
        Parameters:
        sc - The sample chunk that will be played.

      • afterPlay

        void afterPlay(AudioPlayer ap,
               SampleChunk sc)
        Called after the audio player given has played a sample chunk
        Parameters:
        ap - The audio player that played a sample chunk
        sc - The sample chunk last played

      • audioEnded

        void audioEnded()
        Called when the audio stream reaches the end.
